website_summaries.verdict: Large-capacity, stylish polyester and faux leather and nylon bicycle saddle bag with a 1.2 liter internal storage capacity for bicycling necessities.
pros: Solid, long-wearing construction using 600 Denier polyester and faux leather
Protectively waterproof, easy to install with straps and buckles
Zipper open-close and open design keep valuables safe and easy to access
Reflective stripes added as safety feature
Holds up to 1.2 liters, and net case inside expands storage room
cons: A small number of purchasers expected the bag to be larger
A few had issues with durability of stitching

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my needs
customer_reviews.text: A little too small to hold spare tube, tools, and CO2 canisters. Works fine if you don't need to carry much. Putting on my everyday bike, but I need to carry more stuff on my road bike for long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a casual biker, and I saw bigger things at the local sports stores, not to mention more expensive. This is why I have Prime, right? It fits perfectly under the seat, attaches in a jiff without the need for tools, and holds my little tools. I don't take a ton of things with me because frankly I wouldn't know how to fix them anyway, so this works well for me! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bee

customer_reviews.title: Stash your cash and keys.
customer_reviews.text: Very discreet and practical for small items like my small camera, keys and wallet. Has a hand strap for my clip on rear bike light. A great place to keep things nice and dry and protected if the bike tips. It is waterproof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t expect anything better for the price. Nice appearance, plenty of storage space, and great look. It holds everything you need to have a great ride. In the pics, the bag has a 27.5x2 tube/liner, 2 CO2 refills and trigger, Allen multi tool, 2 tire lever, glueless patches kit. The only weak point are the two side holders, doesn’t stay adjusted. The straps hold the bag in place all the ride (punishment) and keep everything dry too.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Average Saddle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a tad bit bigger but can fit 2 tubes, CO2, tools, chapstick, a few bandaids. It’s filled to max. Could remove a tube if needed for another item. Other reviews mentioned problems with bad stitching and tearing on their rides. Yet to ride with it but hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, well designed, not as big as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as the photo led me to believe. The stated dimensions seem accurate but the photo is deceiving - at least in my view. I really only wanted something to store my wallet phone and keys when I'm on a ride - this does that but with little room to spare. I'll keep it because it works. Seems to be made well. I like the strap to attach my rear light and the extra reflector strip.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.M.

customer_reviews.title: Tough, good size, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag! tough and you can fit allot in it. Just the rite size for an adult bike.
customer_reviews.author: JRDZAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tore after few uses on mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning the bag seemed like it did job, but after a few uses with a mountain bike I noticed the straps tend to slide, therefore resulting in the bag being suspended a bit loose, causing the tear. In terms of size it can hold a toolkit, a patch kit and tube, which is exactly what I need for my rides, but perhaps the weight is probably too much for it to handle. I used it during rain on one occasion and all items inside were kept dry. Unfortunately I will have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Seems well-made and I like the buckle fastening system
customer_reviews.text: Holds a surprising amount. I am carrying a bike multi-tool, a 29" tube (Big!), a complete patch kit, 3 larger tire spoons and a single-size Chamois Cream in it! Seems well-made and I like the buckle fastening system. Easy on and off. Reflective piping is the "real deal" and illuminates well. There is a tab on the back for a clip-on red light, if you use one. I would have given it 5 Stars but I'm just a bit skeptical of the sewing that holds the under-seat straps to the bag itself. Wish the sewing and straps were a bit more beefy. But, we'll see over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: but so far this item has worked pretty good with no failures
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little lite, mounted on my mountain bike. A few previous reviews mentioned some quality concerns, but so far this item has worked pretty good with no failures. Fit well, and easily under my seat. I don't carry a lot of weight, don't keep my phone in there, just a few spare parts and tools to do some repairs.
customer_reviews.author: JWeiss

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact pack. Can't beat the price. Holds all the tools needed for repair. Mabye even squeeze in a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Cluecheck

customer_reviews.title: Fits under seat easily
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a torn saddle bag, and finding one for the right price was paramount. This one fit the bill on both price and capacity. Using it now on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heyman

customer_reviews.title: Great bike bag for phones and keys.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is good to hold keys, phones, lock, etc. all depends on the size and weight but great for small items. Fits easily underneath the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: This works great! I am able to put all my personal ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I am able to put all my personal items in it easily. I wish it was waterproof. but I don't often get caught in the rain so it isn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Langley Shazor

customer_reviews.title: In generic noname case
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing about the product delivered that let me know it was the one I ordered. It was a generic case with no identifying markers.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It's the right fit for the road bikes. I mounted under the seat it has 2 clips where we can insert into the seat side lever and lock it. Also, one backside which can hold the seat bar. I kept tube and cycle multi-tool kit. It's a great product for $7.98.
customer_reviews.author: vinodh rathanam

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse for your bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice purse for your bike. Fits nicely under seat as advertised and is quick and simple to install. Not sure about the waterproof guarantee but still a good value. I use mine to put tools and tube repair kit it.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Strap Unravels After 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: This is a small simple bag that does the job, however the workmanship of the product is seriously lacking. After 5 months of use the strap that holds the bag to the underside of the seat has unraveled and is not longer connected on one side. Poorly made bag that falls apart within months. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scotti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your tools and small electronic devices
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesn’t take a lot of space! Perfect for your tools and small electronic devices! Strong material! I Hope it will last long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sergiu

customer_reviews.title: Not the size that was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The description on this product listed it at 1.2 L capacity and it is nowhere near this size. This product is small and made of cheap thin fabric. No recommended if you are looking for a 1.2 L product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Broke and lost a replacement tube while riding! Only last 4 rides!!!
customer_reviews.text: It unsaw/detached from the top and then open the zipper and I lost a tube replacement of my bike! Fortunately my cel was not there! Could have been worst but quality and resistance of this product last only 4 rides! Why?
customer_reviews.author: Cesar J. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: IPhone Does not Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for taking my phone with me but it did not fit, works well for keys and other small things.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Climate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing the bike tool pack and extra tube and fits nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy j

customer_reviews.title: Attaches securely
customer_reviews.text: Besides being waterproof, I was especially interested in a bag that attached more securely and reliably than the Velcro system used on the previous bike bag. I really like the plastic snaps this bag uses. Velcro would come loose on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Coralizer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well under the bike seat, has plenty of room, and well made. For the dough very good value.
customer_reviews.author: acegx

customer_reviews.title: Hold a lot of stuff and rear warring light
customer_reviews.text: It looks small, but it hold more stuff then my previous bag. It also holding rear warring light. I like that feature. If this bag can be expanded, it will be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Yang

customer_reviews.title: Small and very useful pouch!
customer_reviews.text: Very good little carrier. Well made and fits the bike well. It is small, however. I carry a universal bike tool and small patch kit and that's about it will accommodate. That OK. Great price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bullis

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very small, not big enough for bike lock. Perhaps you can put miniature stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vides

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Had it for a while and it works perfectly. It has maintained its durability and the zipper works fine. For the price this is a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Ava411

customer_reviews.title: Nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Good to hold a tube and co2 cartridge. It has a loop on the back that I also attach my red tail light. That is nice. It keeps all that stuff out of my way until I need it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Burbidge

customer_reviews.title: I've tried prying the prongs apart hoping the might catch better. But it's fruitless
customer_reviews.text: The clips don't hold. I'm not even packing anything heavy, just the normal patch kit and a couple of tools. Hit one bump and the clips pop loose and it dangles. I've tried prying the prongs apart hoping the might catch better. But it's fruitless. This is cheap poorly designed junk.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the back of my bike. I put my tools in it.
customer_reviews.author: SusanL

customer_reviews.title: Too small and smells like toxic waste.
customer_reviews.text: 300mL is more like it. No way to fit a tube, multi tool, salt tabs, and C02 cartridge in.
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for what I need to pack. Everything else will be in my rear pocket anyway!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small little thing
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected, but other than that seems okay. Weather resistant, which is good because I use my bike to get to work on most days and keep it outside.
customer_reviews.author: jessi & sky

customer_reviews.title: Not the pouch pictured.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these pouches that we bought on Amazon. When we needed a third I clicked on "buy again" and was shown a picture of the the pouch we own so I ordered it. This is not the same pouch and is obviously of lower quality. No where does it say Roswheel on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach perfect fit for an extra tube and your house keys/any small personal items. Like the reflective strip and the loop to attach a taillight Seems pretty heavy duty and should last all types of rides
customer_reviews.author: B-Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great. You can't hang it on the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You can't hang it on the back of your seat horizontally, it only can be attached in the way that it looks in the picture. Great product though. Easy to attach, zipper seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bag. I thought 1.2 L would be big but its hides perfectly under my mountain bike seat. I will say I am a little disappointed it wont fit my iphone 7 plus but thats not a huge deal to me. Fits my keys, spare tube, some tools with a bit of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Evitza N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad on the small side fits everything I want but there's just barely enough room but I like how compact it is at the same time because it doesn't get in the way
customer_reviews.author: Paul s Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1st ride
customer_reviews.text: Went mnt biking once and had this thing rip and everything fell out on the trail. Luckily i heard my bike tool and bike tube drop, before riding to far.
customer_reviews.author: DTT San Diego

customer_reviews.title: which isn't a bad thing, just perhaps looks a little cheaper than ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought also it appears to be a hard case from the photo but its actually soft, which isn't a bad thing, just perhaps looks a little cheaper than the photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use, fits phone (Galaxy s6). Still need to get a reflector to put on it but it seems like plug and play, easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle bag
customer_reviews.text: Put it on my gravel bike. Stays secure. Fits 2 tubes for 38c tires, tire wrenches and co2.
customer_reviews.author: William Mortellar

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: After being on the trails for about 15 min both straps that hold the bag to the bike detached and were broken. I had to carry it back to my car ruining my ride. At least I was Lucky enough to notice it before losing it in the middle of the woods with my ID, Phone And keys...
customer_reviews.author: Fabiana Bello

customer_reviews.title: Fits a wallet easily, not much more though
customer_reviews.text: Fits a normal , tri fold wallet easily, but not much more room. But that's all I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Kvn

customer_reviews.title: Rc
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting it to be a bit larger but easy to deal with arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and paid for
customer_reviews.text: No surprises with this item...it is exactly what it claims and seems of the appropriate quality. It has already done about 50 miles and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MalibuMatt

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching broke on the first ride
customer_reviews.text: Poor stitching broke on the first ride. I put my phone and a bike multitool in it, and that's all it took to break a strap on a dirt road. Luckily it was fixable. Update: after a few months of very occasional use: seams are falling apart around the zipper, making it useless. Bust maybe I was shoving too much stuff in it?
customer_reviews.author: thrift seeker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible, I went out on a novice mountain bike trail and it broke. So I returned it and got another one and the same thing happened it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Check you measurements. Smaller than I expected. Won't hold my iPhone 7Plus. Good for tools, maybe a snack or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: It is okay.
customer_reviews.text: It looks more stiff in the photos. It does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ok good quality and takes a great spot on the bike
customer_reviews.text: Ok good quality and takes a great spot on the bike. But it is small. Not much you can squeeze in. I have one tool in there
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wagner

customer_reviews.title: misleading
customer_reviews.text: picture is misleading. its a tiny bag, my galaxsy s8 barely fits in.
customer_reviews.author: beram

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Smaller than i thought, but fits my keys and bike tool with a bit more room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: nryanm

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get as much in as I thought like a small bike pump oh well it is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get as much in as I thought like a small bike pump oh well it is what it is
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ray Angus

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits well under the saddle
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits well under the saddle. I expect it to perform well for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hunkapiller

customer_reviews.title: stitching ripped after 5 rides
customer_reviews.text: bag worked good for keys and cell phone for about 5 times was riding on a trail and the bag fell off and got stuck in spokes causing me to wipe out could have broken or lost phone, or gotten injured they need more then thin thread to hold main point of contact stitching on
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work on my bike. My seat is ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work on my bike. My seat is too low so it hits the tire. Also very small. They should make just a little bigger to fit water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The strap with the buckles on the top ripped after only a month of use. I don’t even ride every day, probably only got 5-10 uses out of this product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: A pouch
customer_reviews.text: This bag is cool for small wrenches. I Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Arnell Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. Used for 3 months and seems sturdy. It took a little while to install and installation wasnt intuitive - it may just be me!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkfloyd

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than the picture makes it look to be. Can't even fit my phone in it, piratically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact SubSeat Sack
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe they fit all this in here. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shepherdson

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to put too much in this bag but works well for a few essentials and the attachment system is very good; secures
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Don't expect to put too much in this bag but works well for a few essentials and the attachment system is very good; secures snugly
customer_reviews.author: Milton Koop

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: I used the bag once. 3 miles into the maiden voyage with this bag on local Midwest trails and I started to hear the clang of items landing on the trail. To my dismay, the bag had torn along an entire seam. I has to back track and find all of my strewn items. Contents included keys, multitool, phone and granola bar. Ridiculously cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Has never fallen off. Doesn't hold my tall wallet though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for safely carrying a cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great for safely carrying a cell phone. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Sub Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, terrible stitching that brakes right off
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (one for me and one for my son) and after the stitching came out of mine, we tried the second, same thing happened on the next ride. Even though they are cheap they are of no value when you can't use them at all.
customer_reviews.author: william glen

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Item was the perfect size for what I need, but the quality of the stitching was awful. On my first ride the stitching attaching the side buckle all came out. On the second ride, the stitching on the top came undone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years on account of the thin material. Also, plastic buckles started to come un-clipped over time.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than picture. Can't even fit in a tube repair kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom McEllin

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for quality/price. However not large enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for quality/price. However not large enough to even hold the S7 Edge. Returning, hope they have a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice saddle bag to carry keys, bike repair kit. Used on a Trek X-calibur 9 mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: NKS

customer_reviews.title: Seat post strap snapped after 3 month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me 3 months on my road bike before tearing off mid ride. The straps on the side are hard to tighten. Not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected. Will hold one can drink/bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Will hold one can drink/bottle of water and a candy bar but that's about the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The side straps don’t hold so it falls down away from your seat almost dragging on the tire. Also one of the seams tore in the first week. No I didn’t overload it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jon R

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to carry basic tools , cell phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W. Kaskey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, plenty of room for its size. Arrived earlier than expected. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than dimensions suggest
customer_reviews.text: It is only 4.5 inches deep on the inside, not 5.9 inches as advertised Returned
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great pouch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy with plenty of storage room for spare tube, tool kit, etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a little to small but a nice bag
customer_reviews.author: melinda williams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As describe, works well. Price was more expensive compare to other website.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Fits well under the seat
customer_reviews.text: Fits well under the seat and have enough room to store misc items
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Packed for a six month bicycle tour, the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Packed for a six month bicycle tour, the top strap wore out (broke) in the fourth month. No other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Fossati

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is nice, but small than expected. It will not fit an iPhone Plus model.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pangrazio

customer_reviews.title: Very useful bike bag
customer_reviews.text: Very useful bag for my road bike. No complaints. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: mardi

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. But only lasted about 2 rides. Then fell apart. Straps tore off of pouch... won’t buy again. I’ll spend the money for one that will last
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Need to get another for my other bike
customer_reviews.author: bryan habermehl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality the scraps loosened up quite a bit all the time/Plus it tears easily
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro estrada

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good but seemed backwards, may have installed wrong will re try
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice form. Easy to access items
customer_reviews.text: Nice form. Easy to access items. If one has rear mounted water bottle holders - one will need to get creative on how to mount the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Maywood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for basic tools. Stayed in place during riding.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding your small tools or an innertube. Too small for a phone though
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Good accesory.
customer_reviews.text: Good bag to attach to the seat of the bicycle to carry your wallet and cell phone while on a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Size/Return
customer_reviews.text: This is way to small to hold anything. Not worth it. And then I did not get a full refund of the purchased price when I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and plenty room to hold my bike tools
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and plenty room to hold my bike tools. The material is durable and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Functions as one would hope, well made for price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It does it's job, mounts securely, seems sturdy. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian T

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: does not sag and keeps everything dry. nice and low profile
customer_reviews.author: Manny from NJ

customer_reviews.title: In the picture the saddle bag looks bigger than it ...
customer_reviews.text: In the picture the saddle bag looks bigger than it actually is. The saddlebag in reality can hold a cell phone that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ROSWHEEL CestMall 1.2liter Bicycle MTB Cycling PU Saddle Bag, Waterproof Bike Bag Back Seat Pouch, Bicycle Repair Tools Pocket Pack with Reflective Stripes (New Black)
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 
1. Weight: 0.19lb 
2. Color: Black 
3. Capacity:1.2L 
4. Type: Saddle/Seat bag 
5. Size: 5.9*3.0*4.1in (L*W*H) 
6. Installation: Strip with buckle,velcro strip 
7. Material: high quality fabric and Poly/PU leather 

Features: 
★ Fashion design and convenient to carry. Suitable for a variety of bicycles and outdoor cycling. 
★ Suitable for packing cell phones, money, key or ID card, etc. 
★ Bag have a hanging device for rear light. 
★ Double sides with PU material design provides high quality and makes it easy to clean. 

Package includes: 
1 * Bicycle Saddle Bag Black 

If the item you receive is not as the same as the picture, please feel free to contact us, thanks in advance!
feature_bullets: Zip closure and practical open design make it easy to open and prevent falling out of inside items
Strap and buckles for easy installation and unloading; 1.2L capacity bag can store cell phones, money, key or ID card, etc
Made of high-quality PU leather and 600D polyester, great texture and durable; With net case inside to enlarge the store space.Reflective stripes for safe cycling at night
Note:The bag is made of high quality fabric and Poly/PU leather.A little taste is normal, please use before ventilation

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
